attributes.action: enforce the national collection of household rubbish bins on a weekly basis
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned want the prime minister to enforce collection of bins and household rubbish on a weekly basis to ensure our residential streets do not become a maggot, fly and rat infested pestilent stinking rubbish tips which pose a serious bacterial and viral threat to UK communities.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
